      • getPasswordAndHashAlgorithmForUser

        public AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<String,​SupportedPasswordHashAlgorithm> getPasswordAndHashAlgorithmForUser​(String username)
                                                                                                        throws NotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: EndEntityAccessSessionLocal
        Using some heuristics and tarot cards, returns which algorithm and method that's been used to hash this user's password.
        Specified by:
        getPasswordAndHashAlgorithmForUser in interface EndEntityAccessSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        username - the user name of the sought user.
        Returns:
        the password and algorithm for the sought user. If algorithm is hashed, so will the password be, otherwise cleartext. Null if user was not found.
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - fail

        Specified by:
        findUserBySubjectDN in interface EndEntityAccessSession

        admin - admin
        subjectdn - DN
        Returns:
        A list of all EndEntityInformations matching the given DN, or an empty list
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if the admin was not authorized to the end entity profile or issuing CA

      • query

        public Collection<EndEntityInformation> query​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                              Query query,
                                              String caauthorizationstr,
                                              String endentityprofilestr,
                                              int numberofrows,
                                              String endentityAccessRule)
                                       throws IllegalQueryException
        Description copied from interface: EndEntityAccessSession
        Method to execute a customized query on the ra user data. The parameter query should be a legal Query object.
        Specified by:
        query in interface EndEntityAccessSession
        Parameters:
        admin - admin
        query - a number of statements compiled by query class to a SQL 'WHERE'-clause statement.
        caauthorizationstr - is a string placed in the where clause of SQL query indication which CA:s the administrator is authorized to view.
        endentityprofilestr - is a string placed in the where clause of SQL query indication which endentityprofiles the administrator is authorized to view.
        numberofrows - the number of rows to fetch, use 0 for the maximum query count define in the global configuration.
        endentityAccessRule - The end entity access rule that is necessary to execute the query
        Returns:
        a collection of EndEntityInformation.
        Throws:
        IllegalQueryException - when query parameters internal rules isn't fulfilled.
        See Also:
        Query

      • findByEndEntityProfileId

        public List<UserData> findByEndEntityProfileId​(int endentityprofileid)
        Description copied from interface: EndEntityAccessSessionLocal
        Methods that returns a list of users in the database having the given EndEntityProfile id. This function is mainly for avoiding desynchronization when a end entity profile is deleted.
        Specified by:
        findByEndEntityProfileId in interface EndEntityAccessSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        endentityprofileid - the id of end entity profile to look for
        Returns:
        a list of UserDatas with the End Entity Profile

      • findByCertificateProfileId

        public List<String> findByCertificateProfileId​(int certificateprofileid)
        Description copied from interface: EndEntityAccessSessionLocal
        Method that checks if a user exists in the database having the given CertificateProfile id. This function is mainly for avoiding desynchronization when a CertificateProfile is deleted.
        Specified by:
        findByCertificateProfileId in interface EndEntityAccessSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        certificateprofileid - the id of CertificateProfile to look for.
        Returns:
        a list of end entities using the certificate profile

      • getCertificate

        public CertificateWrapper getCertificate​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                         String certSNinHex,
                                         String issuerDN)
                                  throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                                         CADoesntExistsException,
                                         EjbcaException
        Description copied from interface: EndEntityAccessSession
        Fetches an issued certificate. Authorization requirements:
         - A valid certificate
 - /ca_functionality/view_certificate
 - /ca/<of the issing CA>
        Specified by:
        getCertificate in interface EndEntityAccessSession
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - the administrator performing the action.
        certSNinHex - the certificate serial number in hexadecimal representation.
        issuerDN - the issuer of the certificate.
        Returns:
        the certificate wrapper or null if certificate couldn't be found.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if the calling administrator isn't authorized to view the certificate.
        CADoesntExistsException - if a referenced CA does not exist.
        EjbcaException - any EjbcaException.

      • findCertificatesByUsername

        public Collection<CertificateWrapper> findCertificatesByUsername​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                                                 String username,
                                                                 boolean onlyValid,
                                                                 long now)
                                                          throws AuthorizationDeniedException,
                                                                 CertificateEncodingException
        Description copied from interface: EndEntityAccessSession
        Retrieves a collection of certificates as byte array generated for a user. Authorization requirements:
         - /administrator
 - /ra_functionality/view_end_entity
 - /endentityprofilesrules/<end entity profile>/view_end_entity
 - /ca/<ca of user>
        Specified by:
        findCertificatesByUsername in interface EndEntityAccessSession
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - admin
        username - a unique username.
        onlyValid - only return valid certificates not revoked or expired ones.
        now - the current time as long value since epoch.
        Returns:
        a collection of certificate wrappers or an empty list if no certificates, or no user, could be found.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if client isn't authorized to request.
        CertificateEncodingException - if a certificate could not be encoded.
